name: Arkanoid Returns
description: Arkanoid Returns is the fourth game in the Arkanoid series. It is largely similar to its predecessor Arkanoid: Doh It Again as it has the same power-ups (plus the Giga-Ball) and board size. Some of the level designs have even been reused. The game has 50 levels, and the theme changes every 9 levels. Unlike past games, it doesn't have any boss battles.
alsoFor: Arcade, PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View
